hero.title: Welcome to The Tribe Guardians
hero.subtitle: A healing journey in Israel and abroad with Amazonian medicine

intro.paragraph: Before the initial acquaintance process, please find below the initial registration forms. We would appreciate if you fill them out from your computer at your leisure, and we recommend setting aside about half an hour to complete them. The information in the forms is personal and confidential – filling them out does not constitute any commitment.

notice.title: Please note:
notice.text: Most of the detailed information about the journey will be sent to you after we complete the initial screening stage, in a personal process. After completing the forms – The Tribe Guardians team will contact you to continue the personal process and provide additional information.
